title: 가정법 과거완료진행
description: If I had been ~ing… 구조를 복잡한 감정과 함께 말해봅니다.
examples: If I had been working harder, I would have achieved better results and felt more satisfied.
Had she been paying attention to the market trends, she would have made more profitable investments.
If they had been communicating more effectively, the misunderstanding wouldn't have occurred.

sentences.kr: 만약 내가 더 열심히 일하고 있었다면, 더 나은 결과를 얻었을 것이고 더 만족스러웠을 것이다.
sentences.en: If I had been working harder, I would have achieved better results and felt more satisfied.

sentences.kr: 만약 그녀가 시장 동향에 주의를 기울이고 있었다면, 더 수익성 있는 투자를 했을 것이다.
sentences.en: Had she been paying attention to the market trends, she would have made more profitable investments.

sentences.kr: 만약 그들이 더 효과적으로 소통하고 있었다면, 오해가 발생하지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: If they had been communicating more effectively, the misunderstanding wouldn't have occurred.

sentences.kr: 만약 그가 건강에 더 신경을 쓰고 있었다면, 지금처럼 심각한 병에 걸리지 않았을 것이고 가족들도 걱정하지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: If he had been taking better care of his health, he wouldn't have developed such a serious illness and his family wouldn't have been so worried.

sentences.kr: 만약 학생들이 더 적극적으로 참여하고 있었다면, 수업이 더 흥미로웠을 것이고 모두가 더 많이 배웠을 것이다.
sentences.en: Had the students been participating more actively, the class would have been more interesting and everyone would have learned much more.

sentences.kr: 만약 정부가 환경 보호에 더 집중하고 있었다면, 현재의 기후 위기를 피할 수 있었을 것이고 미래 세대에 대한 죄책감을 느끼지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: If the government had been focusing more on environmental protection, we could have avoided the current climate crisis and wouldn't feel guilty about future generations.

sentences.kr: 만약 회사가 직원 복지에 더 투자하고 있었다면, 이직률이 낮았을 것이고 회사 분위기도 훨씬 좋았을 것이다.
sentences.en: If the company had been investing more in employee welfare, the turnover rate would have been lower and the company atmosphere would have been much better.

sentences.kr: 만약 그녀가 자신의 꿈을 추구하고 있었다면, 지금 훨씬 행복했을 것이고 후회하지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: Had she been pursuing her dreams, she would be much happier now and wouldn't have any regrets.
